entry.title: openai/codex: Lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal
entry.content: Lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal

entry.title: yerTools/simple-frontend-stack: A lightweight frontend stack for rapid web app development powered by SolidJS, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Includes optional PocketBase backend with Bun and Vite for blazing-fast development workflow. Features responsive design, component libraries, animations, and production-ready optimizations with comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.
entry.content: A lightweight frontend stack for rapid web app development powered by SolidJS, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Includes optional PocketBase backend with Bun and Vite for blazing-fast development workflow. Features responsive design, component libraries, animations, and production-ready optimizations with comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.

entry.title: webreactiva-devs/mcp-character-counter: A lightweight Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides detailed character analysis for text.
entry.content: A lightweight Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides detailed character analysis for text.

entry.title: hhmm134/canvas-sheet: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.
entry.content: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

entry.title: Saruro/Froovo: Froovo is a modern, modular, ultra-lightweight web server written in TypeScript. Designed to deliver exceptional performance with a clean and flexible framework, it is ideal for modern APIs, real-time services and high-performance web applications.
entry.content: Froovo is a modern, modular, ultra-lightweight web server written in TypeScript. Designed to deliver exceptional performance with a clean and flexible framework, it is ideal for modern APIs, real-time services and high-performance web applications.

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
entry.content: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
entry.content: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: bigalorm/bigal: A fast, lightweight ORM for PostgreSQL and node.js, written in Typescript.

entry.title: Pareen1/coin-ping: A lightweight mobile app built with React Native (Expo), allowing users to track live currency prices and receive push notifications when specific interests hit custom price targets.
entry.content: A lightweight mobile app built with React Native (Expo), allowing users to track live currency prices and receive push notifications when specific interests hit custom price targets.

entry.title: error311/FileRise: 🗂️ Lightweight, self-hosted web-based file manager with multi-file upload, editing, and batch operations – built with PHP & JavaScript for seamless file and folder management (Docker & Unraid ready).
entry.content: 🗂️ Lightweight, self-hosted web-based file manager with multi-file upload, editing, and batch operations – built with PHP & JavaScript for seamless file and folder management (Docker & Unraid ready).

entry.title: its-ryyt/Philippines---Javascript-Address-Selector: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.
